code:
%%{CloudNative_Serverless}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User as User Browser
    participant API as Drogon API Pod
    participant DB as PostgreSQL

    Note over User, API: 1. Registration
    User->>API: POST /register
    API->>API: Hash password
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO users
    DB-->>API: Returns User ID
    API-->>User: 201 Created {CloudNative_HelmChart}

    Note over User, API: 2. Create Short Link
    User->>API: POST /shorten (CloudNative_DockerImage)
    API->>API: Validate & Generate Code
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO links
    DB-->>API: OK
    API-->>User: 201 Created {CloudNative_DockerImage}

    Note over User, API: 3. Redirect
    User->>API: GET /{CloudNative_Serverless}
    API->>DB: SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...
    DB-->>API: Return Destination URL
    API-->>User: 302 Found (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Drogon API Pod、PostgreSQL。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Drogon API Pod、PostgreSQL是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Hash password、INSERT INTO users组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于POST /shorten (CloudNative_DockerImage)、Validate & Generate Code，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达POST /shorten (CloudNative_DockerImage)、Validate & Generate Code结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，POST /shorten (CloudNative_DockerImage)、Validate & Generate Code有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: INSERT INTO links主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是INSERT INTO links应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，INSERT INTO links有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将GET /{CloudNative_Serverless}、SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在GET /{CloudNative_Serverless}、SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...完成整个流程。
